eu_initiatives: Policy and legislation concerning the exploration and production of oil and gas onshore in Europe.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Technical Working Group for Risk Management and Best Available Techniques for hydrocarbons exploration and production#E03348#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3348#Member#C
membership: East of England Energy Group, Natural Gas Vehicles Network
goals__remit:
UKOOG is the representative body for the UK onshore oil and gas industry including exploration, production and storage. Included in our body are the main shale gas and coal bed methane companies in the UK.   
 
The organisation’s objectives are to enhance the profile of the onshore industry, promote better and more open dialogue with key stakeholders, deliver industry wide initiatives and programmes and to ensure standards in safety, the environment and operations are maintained to the highest possible level. Membership is open to all companies active in the onshore industry including those involved in the supply chain.
